description:
net/http: added Put and Delete methods to Client

http.Client has Get, Head and Post, and I missed Delete and Put some
times.

I know it's possible to use Client.Do directly, but Delete and Put
methods are handy too.

messages.text:
These have been proposed and rejected in the past.

Being handy is not sufficient.  The line has to be drawn somewhere,
otherwise the package will get gigantic.  (and it kinda already is)

On Wed, May 9, 2012 at 11:38 AM, <franciscossouza@gmail.com> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
